code: import framerize from'./util';export default function insertionSort(array){var animations=[];for(var i=1;i<array.length;i++){var j=i;animations.push({comparison:[j,j-1],swap:[0,0]});console.log(animations[0]);while(j>0&&array[j]<array[j-1]){swap(j,j-1,array);animations.push({comparison:[j,j-1],swap:[j,j-1]});j-=1;}}return framerize(animations);}function swap(i,j,array){var temp=array[i];array[i]=array[j];array[j]=temp;}
